name: Pineapple Fried Rice
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh red chili (seeded and cut into small pieces),
recipeInstructions: 1. Cut the pineapple in two. Scoop out the flesh and reserve. Separate the juice into a bowl.
2. Heat up a wok and add oil. Stir-fry garlic, red chili, and shrimp paste until aromatic.
3. Add the prawns and stir-fry until half-cooked.
4. Add the rice, pineapple pieces,  1/2 tbsp of the pineapple juice, and stir. Add fish sauce and dark soy sauce to blend well with rice.
6. Stir-fry for another minute then serve.
